A sermon preached before the King, January 30, 1668/9, being the day of the execrable murther of King Charles I by Edward Stillingfleet ... Stillingfleet, Edward, 1635-1699.
[2], 42 p.
Printed by Robert White for Henry Mortlock ad are to he sold at his shop ..., London : 1669.
"Printed by His Majesties special command." Reproduction of original in Duke University Library.
